mapper.update: update t_exp_decorate set name=#{name}, title=#{title}, description=#{description}, begin_time=#{beginTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, update_time=now(), upate_user=#{upateUser}, share_title=#{shareTitle}, share_img=#{shareImg}, begin_money=#{beginMoney}, end_money=#{endMoney} where id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert t_exp_decorate ( name, title, description, begin_time, end_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, share_title, share_img, begin_money, end_money ) values( #{name}, #{title}, #{description}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, now(), now(), #{createUser}, #{shareTitle}, #{shareImg}, #{beginMoney}, #{endMoney} )
mapper.select: select * from t_exp_decorate t where 1=1 and t.id=#{id}

SELECT exp.id, exp.status, exp.name, exp.title, exp.description, date_format(exp.begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as begin_time, date_format(exp.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time, date_format(exp.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, exp.create_user, exp.share_title, exp.share_img, exp.begin_money, exp.end_money, ifnull(exp.exp_uv,"0") as exp_uv, ifnull(exp.exp_pv,"0") as exp_pv, ifnull(exp.count_price,"0.00") as count_price FROM t_exp_decorate exp WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY exp.update_time DESC
